mWEbrRmDAwdSTyc35.name: Directional
mWEbrRmDAwdSTyc35.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mmTw35S4264P3WlSt.name: Tough Skin
mmTw35S4264P3WlSt.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

m-Rre-ax1O3IeCfCH.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

m_WDw9WQ6c_beZR86.name: Oxygen Storage
m_WDw9WQ6c_beZR86.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mkpMCC2McScpEu7Ft.name: Oxygen Storage
mkpMCC2McScpEu7Ft.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mKJDaOdXKlwHtQsIE.name: Oxygen Storage
mKJDaOdXKlwHtQsIE.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mwD4XGFx4otOwHSU8.name: Oxygen Storage
mwD4XGFx4otOwHSU8.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

muLGCbN6ZCpxb0Hus.name: Oxygen Storage
muLGCbN6ZCpxb0Hus.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

m7wasjsK-7zt1tq-C.name: Diffuse
m7wasjsK-7zt1tq-C.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

m4XjgjCLAzPTy9hpg.name: Homogenous
m4XjgjCLAzPTy9hpg.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

m7CNMEND8dCGFsUJI.name: No Blood
m7CNMEND8dCGFsUJI.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

m4EbXZt5Pw0UwoWuy.name: No Brain
m4EbXZt5Pw0UwoWuy.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mE7CrtX-53hZEap6e.name: No Eyes
mE7CrtX-53hZEap6e.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mPjFA2Yac0osGpS2P.name: No Head
mPjFA2Yac0osGpS2P.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mDC0ImKP5mHEjR0j1.name: No Neck
mDC0ImKP5mHEjR0j1.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m_My41H7woGqoTJ0C.name: No Vitals
m_My41H7woGqoTJ0C.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mhbZ8lWBn1ZWxwQ_d.name: Unliving
mhbZ8lWBn1ZWxwQ_d.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
